mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.department AS "department", a.hardware AS "hardware", a.lan_connection AS "lanConnection", a.wifi_office AS "wifiOffice", a.wifi_guest AS "wifiGuest", a.wifi_others AS "wifiOthers", a.vpn AS "vpn", a.usb_drive AS "usbDrive", a.share_drive AS "shareDrive", a.ms_team_drive AS "msTeamDrive", a.threerd_party_cloud_drive AS "threerdPartyCloudDrive", a.internet AS "internet", a.instant_massager AS "instantMassager", a.cloud_transfer AS "cloudTransfer", a.one_drive_personal AS "oneDrivePersonal", a.ms_team_message AS "msTeamMessage", a.software_installation AS "softwareInstallation", a.ms_email_to_external_address AS "msEmailToExternalAddress", a.mfa AS "mfa", a.mobile_email AS "mobileEmail", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_mis_policy_config( id, department, hardware, lan_connection, wifi_office, wifi_guest, wifi_others, vpn, usb_drive, share_drive, ms_team_drive, threerd_party_cloud_drive, internet, instant_massager, cloud_transfer, one_drive_personal, ms_team_message, software_installation, ms_email_to_external_address, mfa, mobile_email, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{department}, #{hardware}, #{lanConnection}, #{wifiOffice}, #{wifiGuest}, #{wifiOthers}, #{vpn}, #{usbDrive}, #{shareDrive}, #{msTeamDrive}, #{threerdPartyCloudDrive}, #{internet}, #{instantMassager}, #{cloudTransfer}, #{oneDrivePersonal}, #{msTeamMessage}, #{softwareInstallation}, #{msEmailToExternalAddress}, #{mfa}, #{mobileEmail}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_mis_policy_config SET department = #{department}, hardware = #{hardware}, lan_connection = #{lanConnection}, wifi_office = #{wifiOffice}, wifi_guest = #{wifiGuest}, wifi_others = #{wifiOthers}, vpn = #{vpn}, usb_drive = #{usbDrive}, share_drive = #{shareDrive}, ms_team_drive = #{msTeamDrive}, threerd_party_cloud_drive = #{threerdPartyCloudDrive}, internet = #{internet}, instant_massager = #{instantMassager}, cloud_transfer = #{cloudTransfer}, one_drive_personal = #{oneDrivePersonal}, ms_team_message = #{msTeamMessage}, software_installation = #{softwareInstallation}, ms_email_to_external_address = #{msEmailToExternalAddress}, mfa = #{mfa}, mobile_email = #{mobileEmail}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
